title: aeplots
text: vignette documents use functions aeplot create tables plots analysing adverse event data clinical trials.
code: library(aeplots)

title: aeplots
text: generate tables plots summarise adverse events clinical trials, R package requires input dataset data frame format. sample dataset two treatment arms shown : need convert body_system_class severity columns factors.
code: data(df2) head(df2, 10) df2$ae_02 <- as.factor(df2$ae_02) # for severity to be presented in ascending order, we order the levels df2$ae_05 <- ordered(df2$ae_05, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

title: aeplots
text: functions aetable, aeseverity, aestacked aebar can take 4 treatment arms. sample dataset 3 treatment arms:
code: data(df3) head(df3, 10) df3$ae_02 <- as.factor(df3$ae_02) df3$ae_05 <- ordered(df2$ae_05, c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

title: aeplots
text: aetable plots table AE summary body system class arm. contains total number participants risk per arm (\(N_{1}\), \(N_{2}\)), frequency (N), proportion (%), total number events (n), incidence rate (IR), number adverse events per participant (mean & SD) treatment effect estimate (IRR) 95% confidence interval (CI). include additional covariates besides arm generalised linear model Poisson function log link, specify vector variable names variables argument.  can specify number decimal places proportions, IR, mean SD columns well number significant figures IRR 95% CI.  can choose drop IRR 95% CI specifying IRR=FALSE.  can also choose drop mean column specifying mean=FALSE.
code: aetable(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("agestrat", "IgEstrat")) aetable(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("agestrat", "IgEstrat"), proportions_dp=2, IR_dp=2, mean_dp=2, SD_dp=2, IRR_sf=4, CI_sf=4) aetable(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=FALSE) aetable(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=FALSE, mean=FALSE)

title: aeplots
text: aetable include IRRs 95% CIs datasets 2 treatment arms.
code: aetable(df3, body_system_class="ae_02", control="C", intervention_levels=c("I1", "I2"), intervention_names=c("Intervention 1", "Intervention 2"))

title: aeplots
text: aeseverity plots table frequencies proportions events severity categories. specify number decimal places proportions via argument proportions_dp.
code: aeseverity(df2, severity="ae_05", arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), proportions_dp=2)

title: aeplots
code: aeseverity(df3, severity="ae_05",arm_levels=c("I1","I2", "C"), arm_names=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Control"))

title: aeplots
text: aedot plots dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval visualise AE harm profiles two-arm randomised controlled trials.
code: aedot(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention="Anti-IgE")

title: aeplots
text: aestacked plots stacked bar chart proportions body system class arm maximum severity. severity ordered, required specify levels severity ascending order argument severity_levels.  can change colour severity specifying vector colour codes corresponding severity level severity_colours argument.
code: aestacked(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", severity="ae_05", arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe")) aestacked(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", severity="ae_05", arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"), severity_colours=c("#D0EE11", "#48B5C4", "#115F9A"))

title: aeplots
code: aestacked(df3, body_system_class="ae_02", severity="ae_05", arm_levels=c("I1","I2", "C"), arm_names=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Control"), severity_levels=c("Mild", "Moderate", "Severe"))

title: aeplots
text: aebar plots bar chart number events reported per participant.  can change colour representing treatment arm specifying vector colour codes arm_colours argument according order arm levels specified arm_levels argument.
code: aebar(df2, arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), facets=FALSE) aebar(df2, arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), arm_colours=c("#FFB55A", "#B2E061"), facets=FALSE)

title: aeplots
text: can plot bar chart treatment arm separate facets specifying facets=TRUE.
code: aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("I1","I2", "C"), arm_names=c("Intervention 1","Intervention 2", "Control"), facets=FALSE) aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("I1","I2", "C"), facets=TRUE)

title: aeplots
text: can save tables docx specifying filepath save_docx_path argument.
code: aetable(df2, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("agestrat", "IgEstrat"), save_docx_path="table.docx")

title: aeplots
text: can save tables plots images specifying filepath save_image_path argument.
code: aebar(df3, arm_levels=c("I1","I2", "C"), arm_names=c("I1","I2", "C"), facets=TRUE, save_image_path="image.png") #> Saving 7 x 6 in image

title: Authors and Citation
text: Xiao Xuan Tan. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Tan X (2023). aeplots: Create Tables Plots Analysing Adverse Event Data Clinical Trials. R package version 0.1.0, https://txx4986.github.io/aeplots/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aeplots: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials},   author = {Xiao Xuan Tan},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://txx4986.github.io/aeplots/}, }

what: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: R package create tables plots analysing adverse event data clinical trials

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: can install aeplots : Please refer devtools documentation instructions set working development environment install devtools depending platform.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("https://github.com/txx4986/aeplots.git")

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: Functions available package: aetable: Plots table AE summary body system class aeseverity: Plots table AE summary severity aedot: Plots dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval give overview harm profile aestacked: Plots stacked bar chart present proportions participants event arm maximum severity aebar: Plots bar chart present number events reported per participant see detailed documentation function:
code: help(aetable) ?aetable

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: adverse_event body_system_class severity id arm date_rand last_visit variable1 variable2 Runny nose Eyes, ear, nose, throat Mild 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Eczema aggravated Dermatological Moderate 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Eczema aggravated Dermatological Severe 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Cold sore Respiratory Mild 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Upper respiratory tract infection Respiratory Mild 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Fractured wrist Musculo-skeletal Severe 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Headache Neurological Moderate 1001 C 2015-01-15 2015-12-23 1 234 Skin infection Dermatological Moderate 1002 2015-01-15 2015-12-22 0 789 Exacerbation eczema Moderate 1002 2015-01-15 2015-12-22 0 789 Toothache Severe 1002 2015-01-15 2015-12-22 0 789 Aching limb Musculo-skeletal Mild 1004 C 2015-01-16 2015-12-14 0 456 Cold symptoms Respiratory Mild 1004 C 2015-01-16 2015-12-14 0 456 Nausea Gastro-intestinal Moderate 1004 C 2015-01-16 2015-12-14 0 456 Coryzal symptoms Respiratory Mild 1004 C 2015-01-16 2015-12-14 0 456 Eczema herpeticum Dermatological Mild 1005 C 2015-02-18 2016-01-20 1 999 Infected eczema Dermatological Severe 1005 C 2015-02-18 2016-01-20 1 999 Allergic reaction (pollen) Allergies Severe 1007 C 2015-02-12 2016-01-18 0 101 Urticaria Dermatological Moderate 1008 2015-02-06 2016-01-04 1 567 Wheeze Respiratory Moderate 1008 2015-02-06 2016-01-04 1 567 Urticaria Dermatological Severe 1008 2015-02-06 2016-01-04 1 567

title: Create Tables and Plots for Analysing Adverse Event Data in Clinical Trials
text: Variable name Variable description Variable type adverse_event Adverse event name Character body_system_class Body system class adverse event Factor severity Severity adverse event Factor id Participant ID Factor/Character/Numeric arm Treatment arm participant (2, 3 4 arms) Factor/Character/Numeric date_rand Randomisation date Date last_visit Date last visit Date variable Variables included generalised linear models Poisson function log link estimation IRRs 95% CIs Factor/Character/Numeric

what: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
text: Bar chart number events reported per participant

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
code: aebar(   data,   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   arm_levels = c("A1", "A2", "A3", "A4"),   arm_names = NULL,   arm_colours = NULL,   facets = TRUE,   save_image_path = NULL )

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar
text: data data frame adverse_event, id arm columns id name id column arm name arm column arm_levels vector factor levels arm variable arm_names vector names arm arm variable arm_colours vector colours arm facets logical value whether plot bar chart facets save_image_path file path save bar chart image

title: Bar chart for number of events reported per participant — aebar

code: aebar(df, arm_levels=c("Anti-IgE","Placebo"), facets=FALSE) #> Error in UseMethod("rename"): no applicable method for 'rename' applied to an object of class "function"

code: aedot(   data,   body_system_class = "body_system_class",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   control = "C",   intervention = "I",   save_image_path = NULL )

text: dot plot proportions alongside treatment effect estimates (IRR) accompanying 95% confidence interval

what: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: aetable used plot table AE summary body system class arm using following summary statistics: Total number participants risk per arm Frequency (number participants least one event event) Proportions (number participants least one event body system class relative number participants risk) Number adverse events per participant: presented counts, mean (SD) Total number events incidence rates (number events relative total time follow-) Treatment effect estimate (IRR) 95% confidence intervals

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
code: aetable(   data,   body_system_class = "body_system_class",   id = "id",   arm = "arm",   date_rand = "date_rand",   last_visit = "last_visit",   control = "C",   intervention_levels = c("I1", "I2", "I3"),   control_name = NULL,   intervention_names = NULL,   IRR = TRUE,   variables = c(),   mean = TRUE,   proportions_dp = 1,   IR_dp = 1,   mean_dp = 1,   SD_dp = 1,   IRR_sf = 3,   CI_sf = 3,   save_image_path = NULL,   save_docx_path = NULL )

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: data data frame adverse_event, body_system_class, id, arm, date_rand last_visit columns body_system_class name body_system_class column id name id column arm name arm column date_rand name date_rand column last_visit name last_visit column control factor level control arm intervention_levels vector factor levels interventions control_name name control arm intervention_names vector names interventions IRR logical value whether include IRR 95% CI column summary table (2 arms) variables vector variable names included glm Poisson model computation IRR (excluding arm) mean logical value whether include mean SD column summary table proportions_dp number decimal places proportions IR_dp number decimal places incidence rate mean_dp number decimal places mean number AEs per participant SD_dp number decimal places standard deviation number AEs per participant IRR_sf number significant figures IRR CI_sf number significant figures 95% CI save_image_path file path save table image save_docx_path file path save table docx

title: Table of AE summary by body system class — aetable
text: flextable AE summary body system class arm

code: ## ADAPT sample data aetable(df, body_system_class="ae_02", control="Placebo", intervention_levels=c("Anti-IgE"), IRR=TRUE, variables = c("agestrat", "IgEstrat"), mean=FALSE) #> Error in UseMethod("rename"): no applicable method for 'rename' applied to an object of class "function"
